attributes.action: recognise the part played by Car Boot Sales in the recycling strategy, and encourage councils to set aside a public car park or similar plot, in a central location for local organisations to use for Car Boot Sales at weekends.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most towns have a public car park which is used by commuters in the week, but is underused at weekends. Local organisations should be able to book this to hold fund raising car boot sales, to enable them to raise much needed funds, and to encourage the Re - use part of the Recycling triangle. Some towns and cities already do this, it needs to be extended nationwide.
